name: Duke® Lemur Center Corner Ring-tail Logo Shirt
shortDescription: Purple, this soft unisex t-shirt features a small ring-tailed lemur and Duke® Lemur Center logo at l...
fullDescription: Purple, this soft unisex t-shirt features a small ring-tailed lemur and Duke® Lemur Center logo at left chest. 52% cotton, 48% polyester.All purchases "give back" to the lemurs at the Duke Lemur Center! Merchandise sales help fund the Education Department and pay for lemur care, housing, veterinary supplies, and conservation initiatives — so you can feel good about the products you buy — or gift to someone you love.
